1659500.name: Project Theta
1659500.description:
Project Theta is a made for VR cross-platform PvP hero shooter. It features fast paced parkour action powered by an advanced movement system that provides the player unparalleled freedom of movement that is intuitive to learn but hard to master.

  • Sprinting: Swing your arms to run faster.
  • Jumping: Crouch then stand up while pressing the jump button to jump higher.
  • Sliding: Crouch down while running to start sliding. The slope of the ground influences slide length and speed.
  • Dashing: Each hero has a unique dash ability, giving bursts of speed but with limited uses.
  • Climbing: Realistic climbing requires the player to grab ledges to pull themselves up.
  • Vaulting: Climbing can be used to vault over obstacles by combining it with crouching.
  • Wall running: Run and jump into any flat vertical surface to wall run. Chain wall runs together with jumps and dashes.
  • Leaning: Lean your upper body around corners and cover without making your avatar side step completely out of cover.

Seamlessly combine all the movement mechanics at your disposal for a fast paced parkour experience while helping your team hunt down and defeat the enemy.

Try some of the single player content available before jumping into PvP. Practice your parkour skills by trying to complete the obstacle course, and your combat skills in the killhouse course or by mowing down hordes of zombies.
